metadata.subject: Baston, Guillaume-André-René, 1741-1825
Baston, Guillaume-André-René, 1741-1825
Baston, Guillaume-André-René, 1741-1825
Condorcet, Jacques-Marie de Caritat de, 1703-1783
Catholic Church. Diocese of Lisieux (France)

Examen d'un écrit intitulé, Consultation pour les curés du diocèse de Lisieux à l'occasion du mandement de M. l'évêque de Lisieux du 20 décembre 1773 et de son instruction pastorale du 13 avril 1774
Prohibited books
metadata.title: Arrest du Conseil d'État du roi, qui supprime plusieurs écrits anonymes, imprimés sans permission
metadata.creator: France.Conseil d'Etat
France. Conseil d'Etat
Simon, P. G. (Pierre-Guillaume), 1722-1787, printer
metadata.publisher: A Paris : Chez P.G. Simon, imprimeur du Parlement, rue Mignon, quartier Saint André-des-Arcs
metadata.description: On the suppression of three anonymously published works regarding the controversy in 1773 between Condorcet, bishop of Lisieux, and his clergy. Two of the works are attributed to Guillaume-André-René Baston. Cf. Quérard, J.M. Supercheris littéraires, III, column 107
metadata.notes: Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Title page and cover are combined.
